full_text:
(a) In the case of removal of residence of any elective officer from the territorial limits of the City, such removal shall, ipso facto, create a vacancy in his office.(b) In the case of removal of residence of any officer elected to represent a specific electoral district from the electoral district for the representation of which he was elected, such removal shall, ipso facto, create a vacancy in his office. 
(S.L. 1953, Ch. 347, Art. 2; S.L. 1973, Ch. 319, §1(m))

1.catch_line: RECALL OF OFFICIALS BY THE PEOPLE.

previous_section.catch_line: RECALL OF OFFICIALS BY THE PEOPLE.

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

REMOVAL OF RESIDENCE. (§ I-IV-4.3)

(a) In the case of removal of residence of any elective officer from the
territorial limits of the City, such removal shall, ipso facto, create a vacancy
in his office.

(b) In the case of removal of residence of any officer elected to represent a
specific electoral district from the electoral district for the representation
of which he was elected, such removal shall, ipso facto, create a vacancy in his
office. 
(S.L. 1953, Ch. 347, Art. 2; S.L. 1973, Ch. 319, §1(m))
